verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] ordered that U.S. flags fly at half - staff as a mark of “ solemn respect ” for those affected by the school shooting in Texas ...
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: ordered] [ARG2: that U.S. flags fly at half - staff as a mark of “ solemn respect ” for those affected by the school shooting in Texas] ...
President Donald Trump has ordered that [ARG1: U.S. flags] [V: fly] [ARGM-DIR: at half - staff] [ARGM-PRP: as a mark of “ solemn respect ” for those affected by the school shooting in Texas] ...
President Donald Trump has ordered that U.S. flags fly at half - staff as a mark of “ solemn respect ” for [ARG1: those] [V: affected] [ARG0: by the school shooting in Texas] ...
